sentence.Network_en: Magdalena considered the past an irrelevant encumbrance.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛格达莱娜把过去看作毫不相干的累赘。

sentence.Network_en: I felt I was being an encumbrance to them.
sentence.Network_cn: 我感到自己成了他们的累赘。

sentence.Network_en: Only by overcoming our weaknesses can we advance without any encumbrance; only by uniting ourselves in our struggle can we be invincible.
sentence.Network_cn: 克服缺点才能轻装前进, 团结战斗才能无往不胜.

list.abs: 请参阅：保留日记帐分录encumbrance accounting（保留会计）用于自动创建请购单、采购订单和发票的保留数的一种 Oracle 财务功能。预算控制功能可以使用保留会.
...任何类型的保留数。您可以人工输入保留分录，定义保留分配或使用日记帐导入以从其它财务系统导入保留分录。encumbrance type（保留类型）允许您依据采购审批流程跟踪预期支出，并对计划支出进行更精确控制的保留类别。例如，承付款（请购单保留数.
... expenditure encumbrance ： 支出保留数 Appropriation encumbrance ： 支出保留数 Appropriation encumbrance ： 岁出保留数.
... Appropriation encumbrance ： 支出保留数 Appropriation encumbrance ： 岁出保留数 Appropriation encumbrance ： 支出保留额.
without doubt 毫无疑问地without encumbrance 无子女拖累without end 无穷

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting an encumbered state; formerly also as incumbrance): from Old French encombrance, from encombrer 'block up' (see encumber)

entry.def: An encumbrance is something or someone that encumbers you.

example.ex: Magdalena considered the past an irrelevant encumbrance.
example.tran: 玛格达莱娜把过去看作毫不相干的累赘。

means.word_mean: 2. a charge against property (as a lien or mortgage)
3. any obstruction that impedes or is burdensome

auth_sentence.content: I decided to get rid of the tent, which was a heavy encumbrance.
auth_sentence.res_content: I decided to get rid of the tent, which was a heavy encumbrance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I decided to get rid of the tent, which was a heavy encumbrance.

auth_sentence.content: The crane had been designed and built by the authorities, who had decided to cleanse the sky of its inelegant encumbrance.
auth_sentence.res_content: The crane had been designed and built by the authorities, who had decided to cleanse the sky of its inelegant encumbrance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The crane had been designed and built by the authorities, who had decided to cleanse the sky of its inelegant encumbrance.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =lie down,表示"躺"; 2. =barrier,表示躺的"东西,障碍"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ac加强+cumb躺+ent……的→adj.横卧的,斜靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 职责所在的,负有……义务的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in内+cumb躺+ent……的→在某[职位]躺着→任某种职位
encumber[v.妨害,阻碍]+ance表名词→encumbrance妨碍物
in内+cumb躺+ency表名词→在某[职位]躺着→职责
suc下面+cumb躺→躺下去→屈从;死亡
